Name: Sealer Assist
About the game: THE DEMO IS NOW AVAILABLE ABOUT THIS GAME Sealer Assist is a Turn based RPG Deck-building game with a lot of different builds. The power of a Sealer is an earned weapon set that not everyone can use, take out on journey of one of said Sealers, beginning first in the Moon Elf Village. Set thousands of years after ''Something'' happens on earth causing an apocalypse. KEY RELEASE GAME FEATURES Over 150 Cards Interesting enemies Pixel art Skill & Turn based Combat Developed by a Community of Dedicated fans Enriched Story
